text: Lost Horse Valley is a valley in Joshua Tree National Park.Lost Horse Mine, Joshua Tree National Park, National Park Service It has been called "the centerpiece of the park" because of the quality of its stands of Joshua trees and its geological formations.A Tour of Joshua Tree National Park, About Geology, Andrew Alden It contains the Lost Horse Mine, of significant historic importance in the park. ==References== Category:Joshua Tree National Park Category:Valleys of California Category:Valleys of Riverside County, California
title: Lost Horse Valley
